phrases.phrase: 법을 범해 가면서 몰래 영업을 하다
meanings: run on the quiet in violation of the law

examples.korean: He was corruption of blood. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 중죄를 범해 사권을 박탈당해 토지에 대한 권리의 상속을 잃었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: In 2002, Rod Stewart and his girlfriend Penny Lancaster were turned away from the Royal Enclosure -- Rod made the fashion faux pas of a blue suit with white shoes and Penny wore a white mini skirt. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 2002년엔 Rod가 흰 구두에 파란 색 양복을 입었고, Penny는 흰 미니스커트를 입는 과실을 범해 Rod Stewart와 그의 여자친구 Penny Lancaster은 왕실 구역에서 발걸음을 돌려야 했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: In 2002, Rod Stewart and his girlfriend Penny Lancaster were turned away from the Royal Enclosure -- Rod made the fashion faux pas of a blue suit with white shoes and Penny wore a white mini skirt. Add to Wordbook
